title: Topic 001 Question 039
body: You have a CI/CD pipeline that uses Cloud Build to build new Docker images and push them to Docker Hub. You use Git for code versioning. After making a change in the Cloud Build YAML configuration, you notice that no new artifacts are being built by the pipeline. You need to resolve the issue following Site
Reliability Engineering practices. What should you do?
options: Disable the CI pipeline and revert to manually building and pushing the artifacts.
Change the CI pipeline to push the artifacts is Container Registry instead of Docker Hub.
Upload the configuration YAML file to Cloud Storage and use Error Reporting to identify and fix the issue.
Run a Git compare between the previous and current Cloud Build Configuration files to find and fix the bug.
